alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 07 at 4:33AM EDT until May 07 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE COUNTY... At 433 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Avalon Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Wedgefield around 440 AM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
